description:
This additional content includes:

- "Beyond the Endless Deep Blue: Chill Version" BGM
- "Fortress of Turmoil: Chill Version" BGM
- "Glutton of the Jungle: Chill Version" BGM
- "Legends of Ages Past: Chill Version" BGM

Enjoy these relaxing arrangements of stage themes and the title screen music in different locations around Elgado Outpost!

- Music can be set in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
- Music cannot be changed during quests.
name: "Stage & Title Music: Chill Version" BGM
